title: Works fine…mostly
text: I’ve been using this for meetings since it came out. Sometimes the mic doesn’t register. Other than that, it’s been fantastic. I wish they would come up with screen sharing for the Vision Pro that would make this app the best.

title: Good for office work
text: Thank you for seemless switch and good interface

title: Not receiving notifications
text: Since the last updates we are not getting notifications ans this is a serious issues. I almost got in trouble because I have missed important messages from my team. Please fix this issue asap!

title: Convenient communication
text: The app can lag sometimes but overall it’s a great tool for employees who are spaced out over a facility. It would be pretty cool if we could edit the colors on our personal devices but that’s neither here nor there.

title: Fake Notifications
text:
Okay, I edited this review and bumped it a star. I disabled all the default notifications except a few that I needed. Hopefully this will cut down the distractions. 

I suspect this is a Marketing “feature”, not I don’t appreciate the numerous notifications (badge numbers). I feel like I need to check to see what’s up, but nothing, just feature toasts. Not uncommon to see the number 4 or 5 over the app icon. I go in and look and close the new feature toast, go back out, the the notification number is gone. Why would someone think this is a good idea?

title: Notification issue
text: I love the app but often it doesn’t sync and is frustrating. I get a notification that I have some but then it isn’t there. I have to log into my computer to see it

title: TEAMS is the best -- for a reason
text:
TEAMS is far and away the best platform in the field of inter-corporate communications. 

This trustworthy office mainstay has redefined excellence through its steadfast adherence to the basics by never failing the user in its sleek and reliable functionality as a common-sense communications tool. 

Thanks for being awesome, TEAMS!

Frank Recchia 
Senior TV Reporter
News 12 Network - NY NJ CT

title: Great
text: It can sometimes be really glitchy but other then that it is great

title: video feed
text:
The video feed is always low quality. 
I have a high end HD camera. It does this on my Mac an Dell laptop.

title: Notifications
text: The Teams app keeps showing I have a number of notifications but upon entering the app there are no new notifications. This has been happening for a few weeks now and needs to be fixed.

title: Team communication
text: It is one of the best tools for communicating with my colleagues, it allows us to stay in touch with each other almost instantaneously. Please keep coming with the innovations.

title: Love it but…
text: It kicked me and my friends out and now I can not sign back in!

title: Works great but
text: Would be nice to be able to choose the alert sound on the iPhone.  It uses a default sound that is the same as other apps that I’ve been critical of also.
